column2: SELECT TOP # my.OBJECT, my.RA, my.DEC, e.bptclass, s.ra, s.dec, s.z, --- p.petroMag_u, p.petroMag_g, p.petroMag_r, p.petroMag_i, p.petroMag_z, --- p.petroMagErr_u, p.petroMagErr_g, p.petroMagErr_r, p.petroMagErr_i, p.petroMagErr_z, --- p.extinction_u, p.extinction_g, p.extinction_r, p.extinction_i, p.extinction_z, --- e.lgm_tot_p5#, e.lgm_tot_p8#, e.lgm_tot_p1#, --- e.sfr_tot_p5#, e.sfr_tot_p8#, e.sfr_tot_p1#, z.spiral, z.elliptical, g.h_alpha_flux, g.h_alpha_flux_err, g.h_beta_flux, g.h_beta_flux_err, g.oiii_#_flux, g.oiii_#_flux_err, g.nii_#_flux, g.nii_#_flux_err, g.sii_#_flux, g.sii_#_flux_err, g.sii_#_flux, g.sii_#_flux_err, g.h_alpha_reqw, g.h_alpha_reqw_err, g.oiii_#_reqw, g.oiii_#_reqw_err ---into mydb.MyTable_# from from MyDB.PTF_objects AS my CROSS APPLY dbo.fGetNearestObjEq (my.RA, my.DEC, #) AS n JOIN PhotoObj AS o ON n.objid = o.objid JOIN SpecPhotoAll AS p ON p.objid = o.objid JOIN galSpecExtra AS e ON e.specobjid = p.specobjid JOIN SpecObj AS s ON s.specobjid = p.specobjid JOIN zooSpec as z on z.specobjid = p.specobjid JOIN galSpecLine AS g ON g.specobjid = p.specobjid --- JOIN SpecPhotoAll AS p ON p.specobjid = g.specobjid WHERE --- AND p.petroMagErr_u > # --- AND p.petroMagErr_g > # --- AND p.petroMagErr_r > # --- AND p.petroMagErr_i > # --- AND p.petroMagErr_z > # --- AND e.lgm_tot_p5# > # z.spiral = # OR z.elliptical = #
